metadata.title: CVE-2017-6062 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The "OpenID Connect Relying Party and OAuth 2.0 Resource Server" (aka mod_auth_openidc) module before 2.1.5 for the Apache HTTP Server does not skip OIDC_CLAIM_ and OIDCAuthNHeader headers in an "OIDCUnAuthAction pass" configuration, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via crafted HTTP traffic.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-1build1').
